name: The Roots
description:
117 has to complete an important task given to him. With this mission, there is a possibility to change the fate of the world. However, throughout the journey, his mind will play various tricks on him, making this task difficult to complete. Download now and witness this epic journey.

Explore the stars memories right now!
The Roots is a game where you will listen to different stories, set in unique vast lands, thousands of years from our day and after 2 apocalypses, with its striking fiction. While listening to the story of the stars believed to come from the sky, get ready for an experience that will bring many emotions and thoughts at the same time with the sense of wonder that will come from learning who you are. On this journey that we will embark on with our character 117, we will see striking lives and come across interesting stories. By playing this game, you will find yourself in an incredible excitement and action by experiencing the experiences of the stars with our main character, 117. Play and join the fun.

Game Contents
Puzzles: You will understand the story much better with the puzzles you will solve.
Short Videos:Short videos will help you feel the atmosphere of the environment.
Mystery:Finishing the game doesn't mean ending the story. To solve mysterious events, you must do much more than just finish the game.
